Based on the forecast, here's what to wa: Based on the forecast, here's what to watch out for.
The upcoming high humidity and rain are: The upcoming high humidity and rain are ideal conditions for Late Blight to spread rapidly. Your tomato crops are highly vulnerable over the next 5-7 days.
Increased moisture can encourage fungal: Increased moisture can encourage fungal growth on all leafy vegetables. Ensure good air circulation and monitor for early signs of mildew.
Proactive steps to protect your farm bas: Proactive steps to protect your farm based on the weather forecast.
With high humidity expected, prune lower: With high humidity expected, prune lower leaves on tomato and potato plants to improve airflow and reduce leaf wetness.
Ensure your fields can handle the foreca: Ensure your fields can handle the forecasted rain. Clear any blocked drainage channels to prevent waterlogging.
Be extra vigilant in the mornings after: Be extra vigilant in the mornings after rainfall. Look for the first signs of blight on lower leaves and stems.
